main event: On January 12, 1958 in Atlanta, Ga., a UFO was observed resembling a telephone pole, changing color from red to red-orange-yellow, bright & changing dimensions, burning & setting similar to a fireball or meteor.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a bright light, changing color, and emitting sparks.
The observation lasted for 6 milliseconds, and the UFO was seen getting smaller and burning.
The sighting occurred in a dark clear sky, approximately 1/2 to 1/2 mile from North East Shopping Center Buford Highway in [REDACTED] GA.
The witness, a housewife, reported clear visibility and calm winds at the time of the sighting.
The conclusion drawn from the report was that the description, flight path, and time duration were consistent with that of a fireball or meteor.
sighted object: UFO resembling a telephone pole, changing color, emitting sparks
